1410001:
When used during an expedition, raises your
Fiery Crystal discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ] for [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ] hours.
1410002:

[Digit:2digits Idx="1" ] hours.
1410003:
When used during an expedition, raises your
Wistful Crystal discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ] for [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ] hours.
1410004:
When used during an expedition, raises your
rare cache discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ] for [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ] hours.
1410005:

discovery levels by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ] for [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ] hours.
